Posts.Content: kvgross wrote: Hi everyone! I'm trying to decide whether to have TC chemo (oncotype score 21) and would like to know who developed neuropathy? Did it eventually go away? Thank you! Dx 9/16/2015, IDC, Left, 1cm, Grade 2, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 10/21/2015 Lumpectomy: Left; Lymph node removal: Sentinel Chemotherapy 12/8/2015 Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide), Taxotere (docetaxel) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: neuropathy on TC kvgross kvgross
